ygData.subject: Re: Kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Find a VERY secluded place (top of the long ramp up to HH from EK for example) with no mobs and no NPC s and equip horn, play DD standing and then go to sleep.
ygData.messageBody:
Find a VERY secluded place (top of the long ramp up to HH from EK for
example) with no mobs and no NPC's and equip horn, play DD standing
and then go to sleep. Get up in the morning and wa'la' full skill.
It takes most of the night.


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: [eqbards] Kiting
Author: Non-HP-isalmen (isalmen@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 8/6/99 10:14 AM

And THEN you add a multiplier for 3 ;) Lets just say, I wish I
would find the boredom to train my brass skill up so I could use
Discord. It is way faster to do damage from what I tried with bats
and rats.

- Ilkka Salmenkaita, isalmen@...
